sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Retrieves sales orders based on given customer number from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Customer Number - Key to uniquely identify the customer within the SAP system.
  • Sales Organization - Organizational unit responsible for the sales and distribution of certain products and services.
  • Single-Character Indicator - Numeric value that determines the sales document type to control the system transactions during sales processing.
  • Additional Fields - Additional fields or values you want to add to the details. These fields are retrieved dynamically from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Outputs :

  • Sales orders - List of sales orders retrieved from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP S/4HANA - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • No or empty response received from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

 

To use this action, the corresponding SAP S/4HANA - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP_S4HANA_RFC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Retrieves sales orders based on given customer number from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Customer Number - Key to uniquely identify the customer within the SAP system.
  • Sales Organization - Organizational unit responsible for the sales and distribution of certain products and services.
  • Single-Character Indicator - Numeric value that determines the sales document type to control the system transactions during sales processing.
  • Additional Fields - Additional fields or values you want to add to the details. These fields are retrieved dynamically from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Outputs :

  • Sales orders - List of sales orders retrieved from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP S/4HANA - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages :

  • No or empty response received from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.
  • Encountered an error. Check log for more details.

 

To use this action, the corresponding SAP S/4HANA - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP_S4HANA_RFC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
